title: Ent Horde (6R28)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	15
Card Type:	Companion • Ent
Strength:	10
Vitality:	5
Resistance:	6
Game Text:	To play, spot 2 Ent companions. Ent Horde's twilight cost is -2 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot. While you can spot more minions than companions, Ent Horde is defender +1.
Lore:	”'With doom we come, with doom we come!'”
Rarity:	R
